'''Fisherman's Storage Solution''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Fisherman's Storage Solution is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest that spawns after popping a bubble near [[Apam Woods]]. The chest is not guaranteed to appear after popping the bubble.
